Pearls
Type: Material
Value: 22
Fine Value: 112
Keywords: Gem
Rough gem
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

A set of literal pearly whites. Great material for making jewellery.

The Pearls item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Pearls is an ingredient in the following recipe:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Create an amulet of pink pearl Needs Basic Trinketry Bench service or better. Trinketry lvl. 42 1x Pink pearl trinket
10x Pearls		 1x Amulet of pink pearl

Job Boards

Pearls can be requested from the following job:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Rewards
Vastalume job board Vastalume 12 +2  Syrenthia Faction Reputation
Vastalume job board Vastalume 1 +3  Syrenthia Faction Reputation
1x   Chest of Syrenthia

Sources

Activity Drops

Activity Name Skills Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.‡
Cave diving Mining lvl. 55
Agility lvl. 55
Foraging lvl. 55		 1-5 17.308% ~1 in 6 2,889 steps 1,258 steps
Seashell searching Foraging lvl. 25 1 6.374% ~1 in 16 1,647 steps 659 steps

‡W.E.A.R is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.
